name: NSFontCollection.UserInfoKey
desc: These constants are used as keys in the didChangeNotification userInfo dictionary to indicate the changes that have taken place.

items.name: class let actionUserInfoKey: NSFontCollection.UserInfoKey
items.desc: An action was taken. See NSFontCollectionAction Key Values for the possible values. An NSString.

items.name: class let nameUserInfoKey: NSFontCollection.UserInfoKey
items.desc: The font collectionâ€™s name. If renamed, this is the new name. An NSString.

items.name: class let oldNameUserInfoKey: NSFontCollection.UserInfoKey
items.desc: Included as a value for the oldNameUserInfoKey key, if present. This is the previous name. An NSString.

items.name: class let visibilityUserInfoKey: NSFontCollection.UserInfoKey
items.desc: The visibly of the font collection. An NSNumber containing a value from the NSFontCollection.Visibility enum.
